title: Advanced fMRI Analysis Pipeline Development
description: Developing a comprehensive pipeline for preprocessing and analyzing functional MRI data with focus on motion correction, spatial normalization, and advanced statistical modeling.
methodology: Combining deep learning approaches with traditional signal processing techniques
expectedOutcomes: Open-source software package for the neuroimaging community

title: Machine Learning for Early Alzheimer's Detection
description: Using machine learning algorithms on multimodal neuroimaging data to identify early biomarkers of Alzheimer's disease progression.
methodology: Ensemble learning with structural and functional MRI features
expectedOutcomes: Clinical decision support tool for early diagnosis

title: Resting-State Network Connectivity Analysis
description: Investigating functional connectivity patterns in resting-state fMRI data across different age groups and clinical populations.
methodology: Graph theory analysis of functional connectivity matrices
